summary: Diff implements KYC fields end-to-end (frontend validation + backend persistence with upgrade-safe migration) and adds a protected Gold & Silver Rates page/route with nav entry. Logo references were updated across Header/Footer/Login to a new asset path, and global background tokens were changed to solid colors (no visible gradients in shown code). One unrelated footer attribution/link appears added.

hallucinated_features.description: Added caffeine.ai attribution link and “Built with … using caffeine.ai” footer copy (with heart icon).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for any footer attribution/copyright copy changes beyond logo/theme/KYC/gold-silver visibility; this is additional user-facing content.
